title: Ticket #1100: Add job attribute for extra CREAM job attributes
description: For most grid universe job types, we provide a way for the user to provide additional attributes that should appear in the job description Condor creates for the remote system. We should provide this for CREAM jobs, but currently don't.
remarks:
2010-Feb-10 10:58:58 by jfrey:
Pushed a commit to V7_5_1-branch for Condor 7.5.1.
check_ins: 2010-Feb-10 10:57   Check-in [17174]: Add job attribute for extra CREAM job attributes. #1100 CREAM job descriptions can contain attributes that Condor doesn't normal set. This new attribute lets the user provide some of these attributes. The value is appended to the end of the new ClassAd job description, just before the ']'. (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
